content: this tiny scrubbie was designed especially for using up the tiniest scraps of yarn its small size was designed for washing the inside bottom of mugs and glasses and other hard to wash areas materials small amount of scrap cotton nylon or acrylic yarn yarn needle gauge gauge doesn t matter crochet firmly & in a gauge you are happy with i used an f hook finished scrubbie measures 3 across directions round 1 chain 4 counts as 1st double_crochet 15 double_crochet in 4rd chain from hook join with a slip_stitch in 4th chain of beg chain 4 16 double_crochet round 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in every double_crochet around join with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 32 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet * chain 3 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around scrubbie join with a slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet end off weave in ends and scrub dishes feel free to make as many of these as you like for local craft fairs/auctions/raffles/bazaars but please do not sell finished items online the pattern itself is not for sale if making for charity please let me know the name of the charity and include my contact info with the item anastaciaknits@verizon net / anastaciaknits on ravelry thanks thanks to pamelascrafts olive2 stiedeman rolyknitter vapmore bonnie0128 gumby28 & mariainct for their test crocheting/thoughts/editing also a big thank you goes out to the testing pool group on ravelry copyright 2008 anastaciaknits on ravelry
